website_summaries.verdict: Breathes easy in hot and cold temperatures, and tested around the world for performance purposes.
pros: A very climate-friendly option, this jacket functions well for keeping you cool and warm when needed
As flattering as this jacket is, it performs even better when in action
cons: Customers note the sleeves could be a bit roomier and the zipper could be more efficient

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for the money
customer_reviews.text: I travel to Ecuador as a volunteer into the cloud forest it rains every single day in this jacket is perfect it folds up fairly small I can fit into a backpack and taken out at a moment's notice when the rain begins to fall it drives very fast and keeps you very warm. I am five foot three and 173 lb and I got a size large and it fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket!💗
customer_reviews.text: Love my jacket! I bought this to go skiing and it worked great! I wore several layers underneath and it helped keep me warm and it definitely kept me dry, lol. (I fell a lot) I loved the design of the pockets too. They kept everything safe and waterproof. I kept my phone in my pocket the whole day with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: SongBird

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket runs a little large.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my fiancée and she loved it. She is 5'1" and 105lbs and got a small. It fits like a medium. If you want a snug fit order a size smaller for a spacey fit I'd say order your normal size. Overall was a great jacket. Had it monogrammed by a friend looks great. Would buy another!
customer_reviews.author: michael-maurice E cummins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket, especially for such a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I used this jacket in Acadia National Park. It fit as expected (just a little big so I can fit a hoodie under it). I'm 5'8" and about 130 pounds. I ordered a medium. It's a flattering feminine fit. Definitely a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bellinger

customer_reviews.title: Good at blocking the wind
customer_reviews.text: Came on time Fit well I was able to wear lighter coat under it with no fit problems . ( you will need to if in temps 32 and below I got an x small and I am 5'8 120 lbs with a 32-26-35 bust waist hip measurement .
customer_reviews.author: Soleil Davis

customer_reviews.title: I ususally wear a medium but went with a large ...
customer_reviews.text: I ususally wear a medium but went with a large so I could layer underneath when needed. It's roomy especially in the arms but a little narrow in the waist, maybe I just have big hips? But everywhere else it fits as a large would.
customer_reviews.author: Shoptillidrop

customer_reviews.title: I live in Oregon where we have had lots of ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in Oregon where we have had lots of rain this winter. The first times I wore this jacket it kept me dry and I was impressed given the price. However I am now experiencing leakes on the arms and back neck area and by the time I get retune from walking my dogs, I am soaked through. I have not washed it so not sure why it is now not keeping me dry. I am now looking for a new rain jacket that I can depend on.
customer_reviews.author: winkler

customer_reviews.title: Fine for dashing to and from the car in the rain, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with the quality of this jacket. Definitely not waterproof in the sleeves. My arms were soaked after being in the rain for 20-30 minutes. The pocket liners are very thin. I had my keys in the pocket, and they sliced the liner open. The other pocket's zipper broke after a couple week's use. I am a dog walker, so the pockets see frequent use for holding and retrieving pick-up bags, treats, etc. It is relatively windproof, but if you are in a lot of wet weather, do not count on this jacket keeping you dry. I can't believe how flimsy the pockets are (zipper and lining).
customer_reviews.author: K. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket for a great price! I am 5'2 120 pounds and got a size small- it fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Wish it weren't falling apart!
customer_reviews.text: I will give this one star as I love the fit and feel of it but I've only worn it a handful of times and it's falling apart. Both zippers on the pockets are shot. One fell off in my hand, the other runs on only 1 side of the track. A tear has started on one pocket and the binding falling apart. I wish this was better as it is the perfect weight jacket but the quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: soegal77

customer_reviews.title: Big on the top, small on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: This was a great rain jacket but it is very small in the hip area. Would not be able to add layers underneath. I ordered the and the XL and the XXL. Normally I wear an L but these were both too tight at the hips and no measurements were given for hips. It is very roomy every where else. I do not have especially large hips so just designed for someone much narrower in general. The lining does not extend to the arms. The lime green is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Cptwitchy

customer_reviews.title: Not fitted for Women.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel of this jacket but I only have it two stars because, I have hips and a small waist and it was not fitted for a woman figure. It is extremely tight around my hips. I had to zip it around my tummy and then pull it down. It wasn't very comfortable. I had plenty of room around the chest and tummy area just not at the hips.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Hieatzman

customer_reviews.title: Zipper came apart!! stay away from this poor product!
customer_reviews.text: I had this jacket for less than 1 year and I'm reducing my rating from 2 stars to 1 star!! I would give it a 0 star if I could. The primary reason for reducing my rating now is that the main zipper to the windbreaker gave out completely, the little slider piece came apart and now the wind breaker is going into the garbage. I'm beyond disappointed with the poor quality of this product! Does this company read reviews and understand that customers expect a product to last more than 1 year?
customer_reviews.author: Bing S.

customer_reviews.title: Well made jacket and a great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice jacket that says it's windproof and rainproof. All the seams are covered and there's a thin thinsulate liner inside that does not come out. It has an inside pocket. And the outside zip pockets for your hands have the little overlap that is on the side the rain would be coming in. It's really well made and very light, too. Velros wrist tabs and hood completely covers your head and tightens up around your face. Lightweight, but will keep you warm with other layers because of the thinsulate lining. This is a super value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is tricky
customer_reviews.text: This was a great rain jacket but it is very small in the hip area. Would not be able to add layers underneath. I ordered the and the XL and the XXL. Normally I wear an L but these were both too tight at the hips and no measurements were given for hips. It is very roomy every where else. I do not have especially large hips so just designed for someone much narrower in general. The lining is only in the body so your arms will be cold if it really gets rainy and chilly. The lime green is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Cptwitchy

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and does appear to be waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried it out yet in cold, rainy weather as yet so can’t fully comment on that yet. However, I poured some water on the sleeve and it appeared to be waterproof. Also, it fits fairly well while providing room for additional layers without appearing too bulky. Wish it were a little more roomy at the very bottom, but then maybe it could look bulky. My only issue is that there appears to be a little stain or flaw in the fabric right in front on the chest area.
customer_reviews.author: APJ

customer_reviews.title: Great light fall jacket/light rain coat must buy
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY happy with my jacket. It fits well it's a bit snug in some places I ordered an XL but I'm a short curvy gal so I wish the xl size was like --3% bigger but it's pretty well perfect. I'm a hot natured person. Even in fall and such I run warmer than most so I like how you can use this as a great raincoat but also a lil light jacket so you're warm not hot. The jacket pockets are awesome. The hood is A bit odd but I don't mind it. Something looser, better than velcro would be nice but it's not bad at all! Highly highly recommend buying especially at the price
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Boss

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this affordable rain jacket for an event I had to go to for work but was very disappointed when it came in. I got the XL which is what I normally wear and it didn't fit my body correctly. I have broad shoulders and a smaller waist and I was very surprised that at how baggy the XL was on my shoulders. I tried zipping it up and it was so tight throughout the hip area and waist area, there was no way I could wear this jacket comfortably. Definitely fit like a slim cut men's jacket, not a women's cut XL jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Karianne Haga

customer_reviews.title: Received a USED garment
customer_reviews.text: I received my rain jacket today , but it is NOT new. It has been used. There is long human hair inside the hood and pet hair all over the inside of the jacket. It also smells of cologne and the hang tag was not attached, but rather placed inside the zip lock bag. This is just so gross. I paid for a new rain coat and expected to receive a new rain coat. If I had have wanted a used jacket I would have shopped for one at a garage sale. I can not give any higher rating than one star on a used unwashed piece of clothing & wish I could give less.
customer_reviews.author: run aussie run

customer_reviews.title: Warm, dry and fashionable.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jacket specifically for my trip to Alaska, and I was extremely pleased. The jacket did a great job of keeping me dry and warm. It was the perfect third layer for the unpredictable weather in Alaska. It is lightweight and breathable, so it didn’t bog me down when it wasn’t raining, unlike other rain jackets I’ve had in the past that are hot and get sweaty on the inside. I live in Florida, and have taken my dog out in the humid rain, and felt comfortable and dry in this jacket without getting overheated. I also love the bright bright color choices, the Velcro on the sleeves and hood, and the zippered pockets and inside pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Kessel

customer_reviews.title: SOO important in Florida!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how I have made it living in Florida this long without a rain jacket. This one is perfect for Florida because it's light weight but still shields me from the rain. I have to walk about 0.8 miles on my daily commute and a lot of times an just an umbrella won't cut it. I like that I can tighten the hood so my hair stays completely dry. This has saved my butt a few times already from walking into work with soaking wet hair. Can not stress enough how much of a lifesaver this jacket has been! Not to mention it has a nice shape and doesn't just make me look like a box, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Auld

customer_reviews.title: The best choice for a rain jacket
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new rain jacket and was having no luck in stores so i decided to take the risk and order this one online. I'm so glad I did because it's good! It also looks nice although on myself it's a little baggy so i think they may run a little large. But I personally prefer that look it as allows me to wear layers underneath without feeling like everything is super tight. I'm very happy I picked this rain jacket and I'd recommend it to others in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia A.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am taking a trip to Canada and need a rain jacket. I actually like it better than the Columbia jacket I ordered (returned that one). The front placket has snaps, not velcro (which grabs when you are trying to zip it). The hood is detachable, which I really like. I am 5'3" and weigh 120 lbs. The small fit perfectly, and I will still be able to put a mid-weight hoodie under it. It's all ready in rotation; not waiting for Canada!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof/windproof
customer_reviews.text: I used this jacket on my trip to Iceland in April. It did a great job as a windbreaker, even in high wind gusts. I also felt it was adequately waterproof during rain, and significant splashes from boat rides and waterfalls. The hood was easy to secure and kept my head and most of my face warm and dry. I usually only wore my thermal shirt underneath during temperatures in the 30’s and 40’s and was comfortable. Only drawback for me was that if you lean your head back far enough while fully zipped up and hood secure, there is a gap where your neck is exposed, but I did not find this to be a major problem.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie S.

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars if I had the option
customer_reviews.text: Upon recieving this jacket I thought the quality was lacking tremendously from others in the past. Needless to say after a month and a half of wearing it 4-6 times a week the zippers on both side pockets have ripped away from the top. I was debating whether or not to stitch the tops of the pockets back together but upon checking the rest of the jacket over it would be a waste of time. The main zipper is letting go as well...... I am highly dissatisfied with the quality of this jacket and will not be purchasing this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly water proof
customer_reviews.text: First, this is a nice looking jacket and I have gotten a lot of compliments on it. It fits well, and is nice in cool weather. However, it is not waterproof in any way. It should not be sold as a "Waterproof Jacket" or "Raincoat". It was fine in a mist or light drizzle, but the first time I got caught out in the rain with the dog, I was as soaked as she was. The water just goes right through the fabric. It says that it is "breathable", so I guess that should have been a clue that it was NOT waterproof... So, I'm still searching for a lightweight rain jacket to keep me dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality jacket for a very reasonable price, and I love the color and the front phone pocket! It's perfect for layering and can be rolled up to fit in a backpack. (not compactly, but it rolls up well.) It kept me very warm while snowshoeing in 30F with just a long sleeved athletic shirt underneath. I could have easily added a thin fleece jacket too if it was colder. It's a very nice jacket and I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DeDe C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nicely designed jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jacket in the pink color and it really looks great. There is nice detailing on it as well such as the sewn in logo, the hidden pocket zippers, and hood as well. The sleeves are elastic with a Velcro closure to tighten it. This is a thin warm lining for the cold fall days. Definitely not for chilli winter though. Overall, very satisfied with this jacket. Nice quality and fit for the price. Glad I bought one.
customer_reviews.author: Jor El

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality of the jacket, it's made very well. Fits almost perfectly and is really really warm. It feels a little bulky but not that hard to move around in. The hood is large and wide so it'll cover everything and protect you from the weather with a beanie on. Easy to open and close, waterproof for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: A.Natalee

customer_reviews.title: Fits good, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Really like this jacket. I got the pink. Very lightweight, waterproof. Hood covers well. Warm enough in milder weather. Need a layer underneath in colder weather..but that's as I expected. Liking all the pockets, especially the inside one to keep my phone dry. I am 5'7", approx 165 lbs & the large covers my belly and bottom just right, & is roomy enough for layering without losing a stylish look. Very pleased, & Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I saw that a lot of people wore this jacket for snowboarding/skiing, but in my opinion, it did not keep me warm enough. I wore a thermal underneath and another jacket and I was still freezing. I think if its windy, you'll need to wear a lot more too. Overall, it is durable for non-windy/snow activities when its warmer and its water proof. For petite females, the jacket might be oversized / long so I recommend sizing down.
customer_reviews.author: TheLittleShopper

customer_reviews.title: Runs very large!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is very nice for a really great price. I bought it for my daughter for camp. She wears a women's XS/2-4. We bought an XS and it was very big for her, but no time to find something else. Thankfully, she is easy to please. She likes it in spite of the fact that it is two sizes too big. It fit me (size M/8) comfortably. I wonder if it is a unisex jacket and they come in men's sizes. This might explain the difference.
customer_reviews.author: runfor4

customer_reviews.title: Terrific jacket for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic jacket for the price! It's waterproof, it has a light but warm lining, and it's got great zippered pockets and an adjustable hood. I've been wearing it while running in 30-40 F weather, sometimes with wind, and the jacket has kept me warm with just one layer underneath. The fabric isn't breathable, but how could you expect that at this price? Great purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Hermer

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The women's Large fits me generously (usually wear a women's 12), is water resistant (I wasn't in a downpour) and warm. Update:. The only annoying part about the jacket is backwards pockets they open to the front not to the back so sliding your hands into your pockets requires picking up the flap and flipping it back and then sliding your hands into the pockets, weird design.
customer_reviews.author: grolydmd

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this coat buy the next size up from what you normally wear it runs a little small. warm an water resistant an a good wind breaker, the hat it a little big but you can remove it if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother if you need waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof. At all. I wore this jacket to an outdoor concert where it rained for about an hour and I ended up soaked underneath the jacket. The fleece blanket I had thrown over my legs did a better job of keeping me dry than this jacket did.
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight rain jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a March trip to Ireland and London where I knew it would be raining. I had to wear a hoodie under it to stay warm as it isn't really that thick, but I knew that when I bought it. I am 5'4", 150lbs with child bearing hips. I bought a large to ensure it fit over my hips and gave me enough room for the hoodie underneath. It fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made. There is a lightweight lining, and interior pockets as well as exterior pockets. As others have noted, it runs a little large, so it is good if you would like to wear a sweater or sweatshirt under it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M Norris

customer_reviews.title: Runs way short by almost 2 sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Sizes run way too small. I ended up giving it swat. It was a very nice jacket and looked if good quality. It just ran so Small that I think the largest size they offer in this jacket would not fit me as I normally wear a large but ordered the XL and it was at least 2 Sizes too small.
customer_reviews.author: Olen s.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light weight jacket that was multifunctional. Which this is. It help protected my ears against the wind when needed. I did not get soaked wearing as a rain coat. And on the chilly mornings perfect. The least thibg I did not like is when my hair gets stuck in velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Janot

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars but love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coat. There's two different uses for it. I'll use it for a spring jacket but my initial reasoning for buying it is because I didn't wanna spend the money on a ski looking coat when I already have coats. So I plan on wearing a long sleeve with my coat and this over it. I gave it 4 stars because it's a size up.my usual is a medium but I don't mind the extra size. So If you're buying it for just regular jacker I definitely reccomend buying a size under your current.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Price
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with the quality of this jacket. I'm 5'4" (125lbs) and I ordered a small. It fits great with room to layer up underneath. If you want a more sleek fit, I would order the XS. I'll be bringing it on upcoming trips to Seattle and Peru, and not to mention Iceland next year! I think it'll serve perfectly. It's good quality, and comparing it to brands like North Face or Patagonia, the price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa C.

customer_reviews.title: Seems fair , needs attention and an upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking jacket. The construction is the bigger issue. While the jacket seems to be solid the quality of the liner and pocket is very short. In particular the stitching in the pocket looks like the machine ran out of thread, and rather than finish stitching the pocket, they just left it. On a side note, my wife lost her earbuds. She also states the Velcro around the hood gets stuck in stuck inside the hood, making it very difficult to put the hood up when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: daniel f

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket but order a size up. I normally wear a large or xlarge depending on the brand. This jacket fitted snug and the sleeves were a little short to my liken. I am planning to order a xxl once they become available to give me a little more room and arm length
customer_reviews.author: Ms. T. Fortson

customer_reviews.title: Returned the jacket to Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The picture of the jacket on the website looks great, the jacket in person leaves many things to be desired. I purchased this jacket for my fourteen-year-old daughter, she usually wears a large, however purchased the jacket in an X-Large, the jacket was still two sizes too small. The jacket is very thin and the zippers stick and the pockets on the outside are shallow. I would not recommend the jacket to anyone not at this price point either.
customer_reviews.author: Edleg

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for our September trip to Switzerland. I needed a light weight, waterproof, jacket that I could pair with layers. It worked out perfectly for me. While in Zermatt we had rain, snow and sunny weather and this jacket kept me warm and dry without feeling heavy. And, also allowed for a sweater and insulated vest.
customer_reviews.author: Gimpy

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for a rain jacket and to give a little warmth. It ran small, could barely zip up. Fabric w is very thin, hard and not comfortable feeling. Very cheap quality. Wish I hadn’t bought it because I refuse to wear it. A waste of my money.😞
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof, Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This jacket, while cute, is not waterproof. After using it at a sporting events, my shirt sleeves were wet. Also, the hood is not large enough and has to be held on. The logos have Chinglish on them. Love the look, but it's not quality material. Will be asking for another rain jacket for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for rain or wind
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed upon opening. Lightweight jacket. Has a very cool vibe to it. It's a women's jacket but my husband opened it first and laid claim to it. Very stylish. Good fall jacket butt it doesn't appear to provide much warmth. Wind breaker more like it or rain protection.
customer_reviews.author: Vjensen

customer_reviews.title: Other than that this would be a good jacket for the rain
customer_reviews.text: I got this jacket a size bigger and it fits perfectly. It’s light weight and some what warm. This is not a jacket to wear searing a football game with pouring down rain. By the 4th quarter my shirt began to get damp. I was not soaked but my shirt was very damp. Other than that this would be a good jacket for the rain, just not sitting in a continuous pour down at a ballgame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The XS is great for us smaller folks!
customer_reviews.text: The XS size was the first jacket in a long time that has had short enough sleeves for me. I'm 5'0" and 100 lbs, and it is a little loose on me (not bad). Fits WAY better than most of my other jackets. I love the color. I got the red, and it really looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best jacket I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jacket was originally for wearing in the plane to block the cold air in the plane and keep me warm. I finally got to wear on my trip and very happy with this awesome jacket not only it is a lightweight but very comfortable and keeping warm while sitting long hour in the cold air blowing plane. Highly recommend this great product, and it looks great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and well made
customer_reviews.text: Due to COVID, my trip was canceled and I have been unable to use the jacket to its full potential living in Florida right now. However, it is well made, pretty lightweight as described and fits nicely. Hopefully, I will get the opportunity to wear soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled about it, but it serves it’s purpose I guess. Looks much better in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t look as flattering in real life as it does in the picture. A little boxy, and the color is off. It looks like more of like a black and red but in real Alibe doesn’t look as flattering in real life as it does in the picture. A little boxy, and the color is off. It looks like more of like a black and red but It is really a medium colored gray and red.
customer_reviews.author: Debi LN

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! I haven't worn it in the rain yet, but my first impression of it is great. I love the green and gray color combination. I am 5'7", 145#, and I usually wear a women's 8-10/small-medium. The medium fits exactly how I want; not super huge, but I can definitely layer a sweater underneath. The sleeves are nice and long too. I will update as I wear it!
customer_reviews.author: MadreOf2Girls

customer_reviews.title: It was great for the moderate temperatures and occasional misty weather we ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my honeymoon trip to Iceland. It was great for the moderate temperatures and occasional misty weather we encountered on our summertime trip. The jacket fit well and allowed enough room for me to layer clothes underneath for the varying temperatures we encountered. I liked the zippered pockets for when we were in damp places so that I could keep my phone and things safe. I like the color/design, and it was plenty comfortable. Would recommend and purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: AJTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This Jacket was perfect for boating and being outside in th PNW. Loved all the pockets. There are an additional two on the inside. If you are looking for a fitted looking jacket this is not the one. But it looks great and is very comfortable and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Reyj

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it's more like a windbreaker
customer_reviews.text: I love it. If you buy your exact size it would fit great. The only bad thing I would say about it is if u have a lot of hips buy a size up because it fits a little snug at the hips. It's not a winter kinda jacket it's more like a windbreaker. It's very thin. But cute n the color is exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best raincoat ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this raincoat. I am a dog walker and am constantly out in the elements. This is literally the best raincoat I’ve ever owned. The hood comes out far enough to keep the rain from hitting you in the face. It has tons of pockets and even one on the inside breast for your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Neaner

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking jacket
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lightweight waterproof jacket for kayaking and a trip to Alaska so this was just what I needed. I usually wear a 10/12 and ordered a large. But it was way too big and exchanged it for a medium. There is still plenty of room but may be needed if wearing something bulkier underneath. I haven't encountered rain yet wearing it but it was warm and is the perfect weight for me and very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Carey

customer_reviews.title: Just a bit off
customer_reviews.text: The flaps over the pockets are sewn weird. The flap faces the front of the jacket so it will catch air and makes putting hands in the pockets awkward. The fabric is waterproof but felt kinda strange, very rubbery. I Sent it back because the jacket I was planning on replacing was better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Fargo's girl

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute, but not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: super cute, super comfy, it’s a light weight jacket. Cons: I’ve never washed this coat yet, I wear it to go out of the house in if I need a coat. So it’s been worn maybe a handful of times, however the vinyl is already coming off of it. And there’s a ton of strings deciding to pop out of the coat in every area. Do I recommend this product? For the price, no. For the quality, no.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Loveeeee it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good quality jacket! Bought this as a gift for a friend of mine and she’s in love. It’s so comfortable and worth the money. It’s warm as well as light weight. It’s perfect for down pour of rain or chilly days. I’m thinking of buying one for me now lol
customer_reviews.author: Gabi Adragna

customer_reviews.title: Odd Fit
customer_reviews.text: The jacket seemed like it was pretty decent quality, but the fit for the womens jacket felt more like a men's fit. The shoulders where very wide, the sleeves way too long and the hips a bit narrow. Also, while it fit me fine across the chest, anyone busty is going to have some issues. I did order in my normal size (XL) and did not size up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice coat, ensure to read reviews for sizing
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is really off so ensure to read the reviews. I bought an xs based on reviews and I'm glad I did. Still room for layers but still fitted. And sleeves were perfect length which is sometimes an issue for me when I size down. I'm roughly a 6 (so, not an xs...) and the xs fit perfectly. I have worn several days when it may rain to test waterproof claims before I use to go skiing but so far haven't been able to test that.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: nice fit, keeps you dry but sleeve lining coming apart
customer_reviews.text: External parts of the coat are still working well, however, I have not had it very long and have worn it even fewer times and the sleeve lining is already coming apart. It might not matter as to the functionality of the garment (keeping you and items in your pockets dry), but doesn't make me very hopeful it will last long for the price of $34. I have bought $8 rain ponchos that are still intact.
customer_reviews.author: K Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Size not what was expected-too small
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is too small. After reading reviews that said not to buy a size up, I ordered my regular size. Unfortunately it does not fit. I’m 5’2” and wear an xl shirt/jacket, size 16 dress. This jacket will not reach around my hips to zip. It looks like it might fit my chest, but I’ll never know! They don’t offer a larger size, so I’ll have to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mair

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely NOT Waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket for fit and color and quality but IT IS NOT WATERPROOF!! Not even water repellent, really. Word it in a hard shower on a hike and I felt the wet seeping through immediately. Water didn’t even pretend to pull up.
customer_reviews.author: REB

customer_reviews.title: I can definitely fit a sweat shirt underneath which is awesome. It does have an interesting odor
customer_reviews.text: I went up a size because I was a little apprehensive due to all the size issue related reviews. I carry my weight in my lower half and it was a little snug around my hips and loose and long around my arms my stomach. I can definitely fit a sweat shirt underneath which is awesome. It does have an interesting odor. Hopefully that comes out but other than that, its super cute and flattering. We snowboarded for 8 hours and it kept me completely dry. For the price this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Good ski jacket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a ski jacket to layer under. I’m 5’3” 180lbs and I bought a Large and it was on the smaller side. It was tight around the hips. The side pockets don’t zip up well while wearing it and the sleeves are long and baggy. I didn’t mind the sleeves because they weren’t constricting while skiing. The jacket kept the wind out well.l, I wasn’t cold on an 18 degree day.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.E

customer_reviews.title: Windbreaker.Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Sonoran Desert (Sedona) Arizona and only needed something lightweight and not too bulky for the winters here. This jacket is perfect for that. Definitely a wind breaker style. And appears to be good quality!
customer_reviews.author: SEDONA SHERRIE

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the coat I loved it. Good quality material, I Would of given 5 stars, but I live in Vermont and have had the coat for 6 months and did not wear because of our winters. I have worn the coat maybe 20 times and not washed it. Well, the pockets have wholes(no biggy) but then I noticed the whole coat was falling apart, bottom of coat, both arms inside and out wholes. So many wholes that it is not even worth sewing. Very disappointed. The thread used to sew the coat is not made for heavy duty material. Can’t believe I have to throw this coat out.😔
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and feels light weight
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is lightly lined and feels light weight. It does run alittle small to me. I decided not to return it. If you are more a apple build you may need to up size it.
customer_reviews.author: M  Merical

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Durable I wish there was the ability to open this jacket from the bottom for sitting as I have used this for kayaking and snow showing. Need a base layer otherwise this is a great value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jane B

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty waterproof rain jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This rain jacket has kept me dry for 5 years! Living in Florida- there’s always random storms or showers so having a rain jacket is a must. I was able to put this on over my backpack and everything stayed dry. I bought a small and an XS for my sister. I wish I’d gotten the XS because the Small was a little too big for me, but it’s great when I’m also shielding a backpack from the rain.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I do hiking and needed a rain jacket. I had a North Face jacket but wanted something a little roomier. I love this jacket. I like my jackets slightly big but not huge. This jacket is so pretty and fits just perfect! Haven’t worn in a down pour yet so to be continued.....
customer_reviews.author: Aimee B

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and definitely waterproof, tested as it snowed.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on as it snowed and it kept me 100% dry and also warm. I love the color and it looks pretty although it's not as flattering for really curvy women since it doesn't allow for waist adjustments but it's a great jacket overall especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase ever made!
customer_reviews.text: fits great, excellent quality, looks awesome, very detail and nice finish , DOES NOT look like a nylon cheap jacket, actually looks well made, zippers are strong and reliable, water resistant, we took this to guatemala on out trip, and i put it on when volcan the fuego went off and erupted and the jacket got full of ash and water and mud, and every body was cover in vulcano dust, debries, water, vulcano sand, but this jacket , as soon as we came out of the place just shake it once and every thing came off and look really clean not a single drop of water or sand went inside,.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly Rancher Scally  Boy

customer_reviews.title: So she would recommend ordering a size up if you don't want a ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what my mother was looking for, a waterproof jacket that she could wear in multiple seasons, with a sweater underneath in wintry weather and as a stand alone jacket in warmer times. Note: although the jacket fits perfectly, she had ordered the Large size for safety. She normally wears a Medium. So she would recommend ordering a size up if you don't want a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice looking coat
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking coat. The other reviews that complained about the smell where correct. The smell did however air out very quickly. The fit did also have larger loose fitting arms as other reviews stated, but it will be nice when I put layers of clothing under it. I have not tested it out in the rain yet so we will see how that goes. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: oneniner

customer_reviews.title: The inside of the front lower pockets ripped from minor use.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this jacket for the first year. I use it for rain and as a windbreaker when cross country skiing. This past winter I notices the inside of the front pocket was pulling away from the seam. Now both pockets are ripped and unusable. I have never overstuffed the pockets. Keys and a dog waste bag are the heaviest things for which I used them.I have had no issues with the top breast or inside pockets. Another downside to this jacket is the lack of a breath ability. The length of my arms sweat when wearing in rainy warmer weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jacket is great but it smells!
customer_reviews.text: So, I would give this a 5 star review but out of the package the jacket had a strong FISH odor! It was really pungent but I needed the jacket the next day for a camping trip. After 2 machine washes with downy balls the jacket smells great. It fits well. If you dont mind washing it before you wear it, it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: ferc

customer_reviews.title: Will re-review when I get the proper size.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size L. Claims to fit 47" chest. Mine measures 41". I could barely put on this jacket. Very disappointing. Once on, I could only bring the zipper together with a whole inch gap. The size chart tells me the XL is approximately 1/2" larger in the chest and waist, but I'll order it and see what happens. Otherwise, it's a nice jacket and will be great for PNW weather and cycling.
customer_reviews.author: Allisa

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Rain Jacket!!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I read a good amount of reviews for this jacket and may I say... SORRY but its perfect.. I'm 5' 7" at 175... and the Large was more then perfect. Has a nice thin lining, the color is great, I picked the green one. All zippers, snaps and velcros work!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer - AH

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket will keep you dry. If you use it for jogging, it will also keep all your moisture in! Its It's not breathable, but it keeps you warm. I was happy about the sleeve length, and the hood is great. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a nice coat way too small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this coat for a trip but when I got it was way too small. I generally wear an XL in tops and jackets but in this one I felt like I was going to split the back. Not made for women who have broader shoulders. I was very disappointed. Only gave two stars because it would have been a nice jacket if they would have made it an actual XL.
customer_reviews.author: amhouser

customer_reviews.title: This super comfort waterproof jacket is very useful and being used ...
customer_reviews.text: This super comfort waterproof jacket is very useful and being used for almost all my outdoor activities. In Florida, especially during winter time, it is very cold if it was raining. I also wore it when we stayed in north in January. The powerful hood, multiple pockets, Adjustable cuffs, and high collar can protect me from cold. Highly recommend for anyone living in north.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great material and pockets but I ordered XS and holy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great material and pockets but I ordered XS and holy crap is it still big. I guess seems a size up but still rather large for an XS. Not form fitting, booooo. But still very complimentary. Mate commented on how cute I look in it despite it leaning more to a men's fit. Hood seems a little weird. The part that attaches together with Velcro in the front just sticks out when just wearing the jacket and looks odd to me. Makes me think of a "penguin look" too when the Velcro is together lolz Live in Pacific NW so really going to test this baby
customer_reviews.author: Lola C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt hold up.
customer_reviews.text: I'm changing my review because within 2 weeks it wasn't holding up it started to rip in spots. The seems started to come apart! I'm very disappointed I really liked this but I will bo longer order from this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Kimi

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Jacket for Fall Weather
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. I bought with the intention of using it hiking but ended up using it all the time now in the fall. I love that it has a front left chest pocket on the inside and outside. Plus it will be good for Nebraska Husker game days! GBR.
customer_reviews.author: JoLynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weight jacket!
customer_reviews.text: The jacket arrived the next day, Great service. I like the jacket, it’s lightweight, seems like it may be fine in cool weather and very comfortable in warm weather. The jacket does fit a little snug. I won’t be able to layer if necessary. I bought size XL and I will have to return it for that reason. I do wish I had a choice of colors for my size. Otherwise, it’s a nice jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Not WaterProof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Jacket for work. I love the fit I found it to run little larger to size. Very light weigh and comfortable. Only water proof to a Misty Rain. If you get a down pour I was soaked right through within 5 minutes . So for the price I paid I was a little disappointed. I will still use this as a windbreaker but definitively not for a raincoat.
customer_reviews.author: STACY FERRIS

customer_reviews.title: Boxy shape, long sleeves
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of winter jackets because I do a lot of outdoor sports in the snow. I use shells for downhill skiing with lots of layering underneath. Was hoping to save some money with this one. Too boxy for me and sleeves too long. Sent it back. Decent buy for the money though.
customer_reviews.author: Marja

customer_reviews.title: Great Wind/Rain Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this jacket. Shortly after I purchased the jacket, I had a chance to test it out with heavy rain and wind (not hurricane strength, but strong winds). This jacket withstood both and light as a feather! The materials look and feel of high quality. The hood is removable with a zipper. The strings to cover you head could be closer to the collar/neck, instead of by the ears. I feel like a bunny rabbit! There is a flaw with the embroidered name, it's somewhat different than "Candy Diamond." Thanks...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is lightweight, water repellent and breathable. I am 5 ft and 200 lbs and it fits perfectly in a size 2xl. I like that it makes me look slimmer when wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Monette

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this purchase, as a desert dweller getting ready to travel to a rainy country for two weeks, I wanted something light, but completely water resistant and cute (not frumpy), I searched for months and knew this was the jacket for my trip! I tried it on and it seems like the light weight is going to be great and the fleece lining will keep me warm!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, there is a little room to spare if you are wearing over a sweater. Was perfect for a trip walking around during a rainy trip to Atlanta. Hood is easily removable, but when attached covers well and has a Velcro closure for under the chin area. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Weird Smell
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time but had a horrible odor. I have washed the jacket three different time with three different laundry detergents and the smell will not come out of the jacket. I can’t return it due to me washing it. So just know that when you receive the jacket it will smell horrible. So far I have washed it three times and the smell is still very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought for travel, light, roll it up, zip off hood. Nice security pockets. Has a light lining for cool weather. Would have preferred a little more generous sizing, but all else is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Really disapointed. Sounded like a great jacket and i like it. Bought it for hiking anf being outside for work. Thought id try it out this week and the zipper is super annoying and gets stuck. Really fussy zipper. Id like to keep it and deal with the zipper but as a brand new jacket i shouldnt have to. Planning on returning it this week.
customer_reviews.author: nikole

product_meta.title: Diamond Candy Womens Rain Jacket Waterproof with Hood Lightweight Hiking Jacket
feature_bullets: 【Women Rain Jacket with Hood】: Soft and lightweight shell, Windproof and large hood can be adjusted to get the right fit and protection in inclement weather. Diamond Candy rain jacket outfitted with water-repellent technology is suitable for rainy or misty weather.

【Material】: Super soft and warm fuzzy lining make the best heat retention. Enough cotton padding will keep everywhere of your body warm and prevent heat from losing. The thickness of lining we made is also increased with the seasons change. New added YKK zippers ensure the prime quality and feel.

【Lightweight Jacket for Various Activities】: This waterproof jacket is lightweight and suitable for a variety of outdoor activities perfectly! You can therefore wear it when you go fishing, traveling, hiking, playing sports, running, camping, walking with your dog, or just for daily life.

【Details】: Removable hood. Soft shell is highly waterproof and heavy-duty. 2 zippered waterproof hand pockets, 1 zippered chest pocket, 1 internal pocket, easy to carry phone. Adjustable cuffs help seal in warmth. High collar, enough to protect your neck.

【Upgraded Design】 : According to users' feedbacks, we have optimized more details to improve hiking jackets' functionality. We've added new collar hook and enlarged the pockets. Diamond Candy will always collect customers' feedbacks and offers you a 12-month satisfaction guarantee, making this a completely risk free purchase, so don’t hold back any longer!
